Hiiiiii...
*Glomps* Long time no see!!
It's a pleasure to be here and in your company *winks* and thanks for the welcome.
see you around
Firuze
PS: (throwing a tantrum: I want more "Falling" *pouts then makes puppy eyes* Soon, pretty please? )
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: l_o_sith 
  To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, March 25, 2004 12:22 AM
  Subject: [Norton AntiSpam] [SHQ] Re: Entering shyly...


  I signed up for this list and noticed you have posted.  Thank you for 
  telling me about this list, and welcome to Saitoh fandom.

  Sith


  --- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Firuze" <firuzekhanume2002@y...> wrote:
  > Hi...
  > I suppose it's time to introduce myself... *fidgets slightly*
  > By now, some of you already know that all time RK favorite character 
  is Enishi, and might wonder what I'm doing here. Hell, I even feel 
  myself like some kind of intruder... However, I think it's not exactly 
  a mystery that my second favorite character in the series is Saitou, 
  and that's why I tend to give him an important role in my fics. So, 
  well, I find tempting any place where I can find interesting 
  information  as well as to hear interesting discussions about him, his 
  past and the Shinsengumi. So here I'm. 
  > Yet, there is a second reason, since I am in love with PMK series. 
  The guilty party here is composed by Barbara Sheridan and Miss Behavin 
  *points at both* and their deliciously funny Mibu Times/Dispatch. I 
  found that to understand certain jokes I had to know about PMK, so I 
  decided to download several episodes. Since then, I'm lost in 
  addiction. *wails*
  > A wave of sadness enveloped me over the past weekend, after I saw 
  episode 23, since it announced that next one would be the ending. Is 
  there any news on any kind of continuation? Is there any place where I 
  can read/download scanlations/translations of the manga? I live where 
  the world ends, in deep South America, so you can imagine, no dreams 
  of getting any copy of the manga at all for a very long time. Any info 
  will be deeply appreciated.
  > Firuze
  > 
  >
